page.title: 09LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {Law and Order}is officially maintained by a{Policeman}who is resident in Sinnington, a village about 9 miles away. He makes regular visits to the village and generally keeps his 'ear to the ground'. This is not a difficult task in such a small community as local people seem to know most of what is going on around them. Some trouble is experienced in the Holiday Season with petty crime and drunken problems. Stealing valuables from cars parked at Beauty Spots and the syphoning of petrol also causes some nuisance. There is a Police House with existing cells but now it is a private house. The cells were apparantly put to good use in the time of the Mining Boom when many an inebriated miner slept it off in a cell.
